item.description:
I am a volunteer at Foodshare, so Caryl is allowing me to post this idea as an official event.

The event starts at Flemings Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar, 44 South Main Street, West Hartford, at 5:00pm (or any time until 10:00pm). A donation of $10 gets you an admission sticker and map to other WH eateries participating in the event. Each offers a drink, dinner or appetizer special so you can have a moveable feast and sample new eateries in the name of a good cause.

The proceeds raised at the Charity Tastes N' Toasts event on August 11th will help support Foodshare's vision of creating a community where hunger is universally unacceptable and where businesses, organizations, and individuals work together to ensure that everyone has access to good, nutritious food. Foodshare serves as our regionâ€™s food bank and distributes 16 tons of food each day to a network of nearly 350 local partners that feed our hungry neighbors. Every $30 that Foodshare receives provides enough food for a hungry person for an entire month and 94% of Foodshare's resources go directly to ending hunger. More info on their FB page: http://www.facebook.c... There is a page on the Blue Back Square site but it still has the July dates.

This is a weekly event sponsored by the Blue Back Square restaurants. Each week a different restaurant hosts a different charity. The host restaurant offers the opportunity to learn about the specific charity benefited by the day's activities through an educational display within the restaurant. Since I volunteer for Foodshare, I have information about this event and thought it sounds like fun!

I set the start time as 6:30pm because I don't get out of work in time for the 5:00pm opening. I'll try to get to Flemings a little before 6:30pm so we can meet and then decide as a group what sounds most interesting: Moveable feast with appetizer at one location and main course at another? Or just one restaurant for the evening?
item.name: Wednesday Night Tastes N' Toasts at Blue Back Square - August 11th
